explanation: [0-0] A man in blue clothes sits on a black roof, looking down at his phone. He is holding a rope in his left hand, which is tied to a blue bucket. A woman in a pink sweater stands on a ladder with her left hand in the bucket. The walls of the house are white and stained with mud.

[0-3] The woman in the pink sweater takes a wet rag out of the bucket and cleans the mud off the wall. She then puts the rag back into the bucket and takes it out again to continue cleaning. The man in blue then lets go of the rope and the bucket falls. The woman in pink throws the rag on the ground and points her left index finger at the man in blue, who looks down. Then a man in black walks in from the left and hands a purple hose to the woman in pink.

[3-10] The scene then switches to a blue faucet. A hand is shown installing a gold metal tool at the faucet's water outlet. A purple hose is inserted into the metal tool, and the screw on the tool is tightened to connect the faucet and the hose. Then the hand pulls down on the hose. Finally, a long metal nozzle is attached to the other end of the hose, and the screw is tightened to connect the nozzle and the hose.
